sentences.en: All letters were opened in transit.
sentences.cn: 所有信件在邮递的过程中都要受到检查.

sentences.en: baggage that is lost or damaged in transit
sentences.cn: 在运输过程中丢失或损坏的行李

sentences.en: Bus and rapid transit fares are certain to rise following wage settlements.
sentences.cn: 在工资问题解决之后,公共汽车和高速交通的费用肯定要上涨.

sentences.en: During their talks, the two presidents discussed the transit of goods between the two countries.
sentences.cn: 会谈中，两位总统讨论了两国间货物运输的问题。
水果在运送时容易腐烂.

sentences.en: His luggage was lost in transit.
sentences.cn: 他的行李在运送中丢失.

sentences.en: It's dangerous to transit across the icy little bridge.
sentences.cn: 通过结冰的小桥是危险的.

sentences.en: Magmas in transit to the surface will further supplement this heat.
sentences.cn: 向地表运移的岩浆将进一步补充这种热量.

sentences.en: On various occasions, she spoke up for the common interest in maintaining freedom of navigation, unimpeded lawful commerce, and transit of people across the seas.
sentences.cn: 在各种场合，她都为那些对维持现有海洋航行自由、畅通无阻的合法贸易和运输有共同利益的人辩护。

sentences.en: One of the packages was damaged in transit.
sentences.cn: 包裹有一件在运输过程中损坏了.

sentences.en: Only ships of 10,000 tons or smaller are able to transit.
sentences.cn: 只有一万吨或一万吨以下的船能够通过.

sentences.en: The shortage you claimed might have occurred in the course of transit, which is out of our control.
sentences.cn: 贵方所提出的货物短缺可能是在运输过程中发生的，这是我们所无法控制的。

sentences.en: These goods were damaged in transit.
sentences.cn: 这些货物在运输过程中损坏了.

sentences.en: They were in transit to Bombay.
sentences.cn: 他们在去往孟买的途中。

sentences.en: Two rapid transit trains collided early this morning in Boston.
sentences.cn: 今晨早些时候，两辆高速火车在波士顿相撞。

sentences.en: We cannot be held responsible for goods lost in transit.
sentences.cn: 我们不能对运送中丢失的货物负责。

sentences.en: You must allow for five per cent wastage in transit.
sentences.cn: 在运输中要允许有百分之五的损耗量.

words.tran_cn: 过渡；转变；[分子生物] 转换；变调

城市轨道交通；铁路直达运输
高速交通；高速铁路交通；快速运输

trans.tran_cn: 运输，运送，经过，中转，交通运输系统
trans.tran_en: the process of moving goods or people from one place to another
